body_html:
I agree with requires_grad=False, volatile=False for automatic Tensor to Variable conversion for the same reasons @adamlerer mentions.

I think the main concern is the issue raised by @jekbradbury: Some users won't realize that this conversion is happening, and it will be pretty unobvious that they should manually construct a Variable with volatile=True if they want to run inference with more efficient memory usage.

body:
I agree with `requires_grad=False`, `volatile=False` for automatic Tensor to Variable conversion for the same reasons @adamlerer mentions.

I think the main concern is the issue raised by @jekbradbury: Some users won't realize that this conversion is happening, and it will be pretty unobvious that they should manually construct a Variable with `volatile=True` if they want to run inference with more efficient memory usage.
